channel.title: CVE Feed for abode systems, inc. -- iota All-In-One Security Kit
channel.description: The latest CVEs for abode systems, inc. -- iota All-In-One Security Kit

item.title: CVE-2022-35877|2024-09-17T00:56:24.306Z -- abode%20systems%2C%20inc. -- iota%20all-in-one%20security%20kit
item.description: Four format string injection vulnerabilities exist in the XCMD testWifiAP functionality of Abode Systems, Inc. iota All-In-One Security Kit 6.9X and 6.9Z. Specially-crafted configuration values can lead to memory corruption, information disclosure and denial of service. An attacker can modify a configuration value and then execute an XCMD to trigger these vulnerabilities.This vulnerability arises from format string injection via the `default_key_id` configuration parameter, as used within the `testWifiAP` XCMD handler

item.title: CVE-2022-29520|2024-09-17T02:16:01.861Z -- abode%20systems%2C%20inc. -- iota%20all-in-one%20security%20kit
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability exists in the console_main_loop :sys functionality of Abode Systems, Inc. iota All-In-One Security Kit 6.9Z. A specially-crafted XCMD can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can send an XML payload to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-33205|2024-09-17T00:36:00.263Z -- abode%20systems%2C%20inc. -- iota%20all-in-one%20security%20kit
item.description: Four OS command injection vulnerabilities exists in the web interface /action/wirelessConnect functionality of Abode Systems, Inc. iota All-In-One Security Kit 6.9X and 6.9Z. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can make an authenticated HTTP request to trigger these vulnerabilities.This vulnerability focuses on the unsafe use of the `wpapsk_hex` HTTP parameter to construct an OS Command at offset `0x19b0ac` of the `/root/hpgw` binary included in firmware 6.9Z.

item.title: CVE-2022-35887|2024-09-17T00:32:13.648Z -- abode%20systems%2C%20inc. -- iota%20all-in-one%20security%20kit
item.description: Four format string injection vulnerabilities exist in the web interface /action/wirelessConnect functionality of Abode Systems, Inc. iota All-In-One Security Kit 6.9Z and 6.9X. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to memory corruption, information disclosure and denial of service. An attacker can make an authenticated HTTP request to trigger these vulnerabilities.This vulnerability arises from format string injection via the `default_key_id` HTTP parameter, as used within the `/action/wirelessConnect` handler.

item.title: CVE-2022-30603|2024-09-17T02:10:51.989Z -- abode%20systems%2C%20inc. -- iota%20all-in-one%20security%20kit
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability exists in the web interface /action/iperf functionality of Abode Systems, Inc. iota All-In-One Security Kit 6.9X and 6.9Z. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can make an authenticated HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-35244|2024-09-17T01:07:05.171Z -- abode%20systems%2C%20inc. -- iota%20all-in-one%20security%20kit
item.description: A format string injection vulnerability exists in the XCMD getVarHA functionality of abode systems, inc. iota All-In-One Security Kit 6.9X and 6.9Z. A specially-crafted XCMD can lead to memory corruption, information disclosure, and denial of service. An attacker can send a malicious XML payload to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-35879|2024-09-17T00:30:37.252Z -- abode%20systems%2C%20inc. -- iota%20all-in-one%20security%20kit
item.description: Four format string injection vulnerabilities exist in the UPnP logging functionality of Abode Systems, Inc. iota All-In-One Security Kit 6.9Z and 6.9X. A specially-crafted UPnP negotiation can lead to memory corruption, information disclosure, and denial of service. An attacker can host a malicious UPnP service to trigger these vulnerabilities.This vulnerability arises from format string injection via `controlURL` XML tag, as used within the `DoUpdateUPnPbyService` action handler.

item.title: CVE-2022-35880|2024-09-17T00:15:31.269Z -- abode%20systems%2C%20inc. -- iota%20all-in-one%20security%20kit
item.description: Four format string injection vulnerabilities exist in the UPnP logging functionality of Abode Systems, Inc. iota All-In-One Security Kit 6.9Z and 6.9X. A specially-crafted UPnP negotiation can lead to memory corruption, information disclosure, and denial of service. An attacker can host a malicious UPnP service to trigger these vulnerabilities.This vulnerability arises from format string injection via `NewInternalClient` XML tag, as used within the `DoUpdateUPnPbyService` action handler.

item.title: CVE-2022-27805|2024-09-17T02:42:56.504Z -- abode%20systems%2C%20inc. -- iota%20all-in-one%20security%20kit
item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability exists in the GHOME control functionality of Abode Systems, Inc. iota All-In-One Security Kit 6.9X and 6.9Z. A specially-crafted network request can lead to arbitrary XCMD execution. An attacker can send a malicious XML payload to trigger this vulnerability.
